title: React Best Practices
subject: React
theory:
## Writing Clean Code

### 1. File Structure
Group by Feature (`src/features/auth`) rather than Type (`src/components`, `src/actions`).

### 2. Component Size
If a component is > 100 lines, see if you can extract parts (e.g., `ListItem` from `List`).

### 3. Logic Extraction
Move complex useEffect or calculation logic into Custom Hooks (`useUserData`). The UI component should just render.
summary: Consistency and separation of concerns are key to maintainability.
